profile.rationale: The job advertisement details responsibilities and technologies related to traditional software development (building features, using frameworks like Ruby on Rails, GraphQL, ReactJS) and collaboration. There is no mention of AI or Machine Learning tasks or specializations, fitting the definition of a Software Engineer profile.
